body.name: Prevention Oncology Mouthwash, Non-Alcohol, 16oz, Prevention Oncology Mouth Rinse | Alcohol Free - Specially Formulated for Patients Undergoing Oncology Treatment
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Oncology Specific Formulation - Prevention Health Sciences’ over-the-counter (OTC) oncology mouth rinse has been formulated for use by patients going through chemo and radiation therapies. These treatments can result in uncomfortable mouth sores, ulcers, dry mouth, and other oral complications. This gentle mouth rinse is recommended and distributed by physicians to help soothe, alleviate, and control these side-effects, while also protecting the mucosal lining.

Soothes and Protects - Unlike other mouthwash and rinse products that contain alcohol and other additives, our solution is fluoride-, alcohol- and dye-free. The highly effective formulation of low concentration hydrogen peroxide, sodium citrate, zinc, and glycerin protects and soothes. It provides temporary pain relief to irritated areas of the mouth, lips, and throat, and rehydrates and moisturizes the oral cavity to alleviate dry mouth symptoms.
Oral Health Support - The addition of soothing natural menthol and peppermint oil will leave your mouth with a long-lasting clean and refreshed feel.

Safe and Easy To Use - This mouth rinse is safe for all ages and easy to use and administer. Early and regular use will aid in protecting against dry mouth and uncomfortable oral complications, and help in the healing process of current mouth sores and ulcers. We recommend rinsing 3-5 times a day when undergoing chemotherapy and/or radiation treatments. Adults and children ages 2 and older should gargle or swish around in the mouth for one minute, then spit out.

Prevention Health Sciences - We believe that good oral health begins with prevention. We provide a line of oral rinses and mouthwashes that are free of harsh chemicals and ingredients, always naturally flavored, and dye- and alcohol-free. We also offer fluoride free options! Our line of oral care products are recommended by health care professionals for both oncology related oral issues as well as every day care and protection. We provide preventative solutions for proper oral health care!
body.description: Oral Health Support During Treatment Prevention Oncology is an over-the-counter (OTC) medicine that is designed for people going through chemotherapy or radiation for cancer. Chemotherapy and Radiation causes mouth sores, dry mouth, and other issues. Our gentle formula also helps you to alleviate the pain from these problems. This mouth rinse is alcohol, fluoride, and dye-free. Use it with no worries of any side effects, and can be used in conjunction with prescription meds. Rinse 3-5 times a day and notice the difference!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gentle, Hydrating Formula Our mouth rinse features a gentle formula with mild flavoring. So, you do not need to worry about a strong aftertaste. The mouth rinse is also gentle on the teeth and gums, making it a great choice for those with sensitive mouths from Oncology treatment. It helps in rehydrating and moisturizing oral cavities. Stop suffering from the dry mouth with our mouth rinse! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tastes and smells nice. Mother on chemo approves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars That it comes sealed and the right product
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t tried the product yet , but the reviews says it works pretty good.Since my last review approximately 3 months ago I’ve tried it, it took about 6 days to really work. They say no alcohol is in it but I got that very strong alcohol burn for about 20 seconds. It is a pretty good product I’m ordering my second bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prevention Oncology Mouthwash, Non-Alcohol, 16oz, Prevention Oncology Mouth Rinse
reviews.reviewText: If your mouth needs a tune up this will do the trick.Thinking back of gargling with Hydrogen Peroxide back in the day but not as bad.Gets all the taste buds a new outlook for food products, if food hasn't been tasting the same lately, and your losing weight.The flavor would not really be absorbed long for the younger sweet mouth types. (No Sugars are added).Doesn't burn like some mouth rinses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for MORE conditions than just oncology!
reviews.reviewText: Really helps with dry mouth which causes decay. Fresh taste without the burn of some other brand mouthwash. Also suitable to add to your Waterpik!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is not mild
reviews.reviewText: For a cancer survivor, who has a sore mouth, this sets your mouth on fire!Not for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works pretty much just as or better than the prescription kind that cost way more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it is advertised!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered for my brother in law which had a cancer in his throat and voice box. He is going thru chemo and radiation treatments and also has a trake in. He said the wash has enabled him to eat and is very soothing to his throat and has helped him avoid a feeding tube. His diet is very bland but being able to swallow food is a great thing. I have ordered more. Great product !
